subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Middle linebackers with the Chicago Bears have a legacy of greatness. And if the Bears are to win the Super Bowl this season, the defense, anchored by linebacker Brian Urlacher, is expected to lead the way.
snippet: Middle linebackers with the Chicago Bears have a legacy of greatness. And if the Bears are to win the Super Bowl this season, the defense, anchored by linebacker Brian Urlacher, is expected to lead the way.
